content.rendered:
An exciting puzzle game in which the player will have to help stick make a daring escape from prison. Stick found himself in a sinister prison, from which there is no way out, except for various ingenious paths, hidden objects and puzzles.The player will explore the various rooms of the prison, paying attention to every small detail and examining objects in search of key clues. Each room is filled with riddles, traps and various items that can be used to escape.
The main task of the player is to choose the right items and use them correctly on the screen to go through all the challenges that stand in the way of freedom. Incorrect choices can lead to fatal consequences, so the player must be careful and attentive.
